directions: Place the lentils, rice, carrots, celery, onion, water, broth, garlic powder, ground black pepper and salt in a slow cooker.
Cover and cook on low setting for 7 to 8 hours. Stir in the mushrooms 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 2 cups uncooked long grain brown rice
title: Slow Cooker Lentil Rice Soup
